room.name: Economy
room.description: A budget-friendly option featuring essential amenities, ideal for solo travelers or couples seeking comfort and value.

room.name: Standard
room.description: A comfortable room with modern furnishings and a queen-size bed, perfect for leisure or business travelers looking for convenience.

room.name: Deluxe
room.description: An elegant space offering a king-size bed and premium amenities, designed for guests seeking a luxurious and relaxing experience.

room.name: Suite
room.description: A spacious accommodation with a separate living area and upscale furnishings, perfect for those desiring luxury and comfort during their stay.
